title: Is there anyone on TikTok that you dislike? Who and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: I especially hate the videos related to using chemicals to play to the gallery no matter who did it. Is it good for health? What do you think? For example this one:  But dentist Dr Linda Greenwall told The Sun that anyone considering teeth whitening should consult their dentist before trying anything themselves. She said: “As dentists, we are seeing an increasing number of patients desperate to whiten their already whitened teeth – a condition known as the Love Island effect. “Excessive use of whitening products can lead to damaging the enamel, dentine, tooth structure and gum health. And also die the hair with something. For what? Will you look prettier because of that? You have to pay the price.  Is there anyone on TikTok whom I don’t like? Charlie D’Amelio’s ex-boyfriend. I don’t like him since he looks a little bit fake to me. I know nothing about him, but he looks gloomy and cunning. And his dancing is just so so. Why did he break up with Charlie? Please don’t be mat at me. I just answer this question. I know nothing about them. Sorry, I can’t answer this question. Thanks for reading. Sources: Teens using 'extremely dangerous' BLEACH to whiten their teeth in new TikTok beauty crazePermanent damage: that's how dangerous tiktok health trends are - World Today News
